text: Antonio Salazar Castillo (7 February 1989 – 8 May 2022) was a Mexican professional footballer. He last played as striker for Cimarrones de Sonora in Ascenso MX in 2015. His career began in 2007. Salazar was found burned and dead on 8 May 2022 inside of a trunk of a car in Tonalá, Jalisco, Mexico at the age of 33. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from fire Category:Mexican footballers Category:Mexican murder victims Category:People from Tamaulipas
title: Antonio Salazar (footballer)
